mapper.sql: record_id, ticket_id, operator_id, operation_type, operation_content, evaluation_score, evaluation_content, is_deleted, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, u.real_name as operator_name FROM t_ticket_record r LEFT JOIN t_user u ON r.operator_id = u.user_id WHERE r.ticket_id = #{ticketId} AND r.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY r.create_time ASC
SELECT r.*, u.real_name as operator_name FROM t_ticket_record r LEFT JOIN t_user u ON r.operator_id = u.user_id WHERE r.record_id = #{recordId} AND r.is_deleted = 0
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_ticket_record
operation_type = #{operationType},
operation_content = #{operationContent},
evaluation_score = #{evaluationScore},
evaluation_content = #{evaluationContent},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
WHERE record_id = #{recordId}

where record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_ticket_record set ticket_id = #{ticketId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, operation_type = #{operationType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, operation_content = #{operationContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, evaluation_score = #{evaluationScore,jdbcType=TINYINT}, evaluation_content = #{evaluationContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
